dialogue.introduction: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. Umm... Yes, I'll do my best. Pleased to meet you!
dialogue.library_intro: As the fourteenth ship of the Yuugumo-class Destroyers, I'm Okinami. I was developed as part of the Rapid Naval Armaments Supplement Programme. Yes, my birthplace was in Maizuru. Though by that time, the front line was already heading towards disintegration... But I still did my best escorting the main fleet and convoys.
dialogue.secretary1: U-Umm...Commander? Did you call for Okinami?
dialogue.secretary2: My glasses...glasses... Oh...I...had them on. Well... That's great.
dialogue.secretary3: Commander? Umm...I'm sorry. I can't see very well... Wah... too close... That's too close, Commander!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Um, Commander? Co... -mmander? Umm... I guess you're busy at the moment. Okinami will then focus on training herself. Right, umm... ummm...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, um... I'm... very sorry for always causing you trouble. Oh, no, not at all...Because you're a very kind Commander. Because you're very kind and I... Huh?... No... Why am I... crying? I don't...Why?
dialogue.wedding: Commander, Did you call for Okinami? Did I do something wrong...I...Huh? That's for me?! Wha... I don't... but... I can't... believe it... Ehhhh?!
dialogue.show_players_score: Th-The information, Commander? Okinami will...bring it over. Aahh!
dialogue.equipment1: An-, an improvement. Thank you very much.
dialogue.equipment2: This equipment is... With this equipment, I won't lose against even a swarm of fighters as thick as clouds. Probably?
dialogue.supply: Commander. From the bottom of my heart, I thank you very much for your kindness.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Um... I'm very sorry. I have to dock for a little while. I'm sorry...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Commander, this is very embarrassing but have to take a bath... a long bath... and um...
dialogue.ship_construction: Commander. there's a new kanmusu that... Yes, that's correct.
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! All ship... prepare for gun battle...Please take care of me.
dialogue.night_battle: I can't see very well at night... But, we have no choice! All ships, charging in!
dialogue.night_attack: M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: M-My glasses... Ah, I'm okay. That's wrong. Firing guns, over there! Fire!
dialogue.mvp: Wha... Ehhhh?! Me? Okinami is number one...? Umm...umm...I, I'm so sorry!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: It, it's okay... My glasses are... safe...
dialogue.sunk: This... is what feels like... to sink into the ocean...? Oh... You... can't see anything... anymore...

hourly.0000: Commander, I'll be the one who declares the time right? I'll be in your care.
hourly.0300: Commander, it's 0300. Eh?! I am too bland you say? uhn...bland? uh... uhnn..
hourly.0400: Commander, it's 0400. Uhm... ah.. yes, it'll be...morning...soon...
hourly.0500: Commander, uhm... it's 0500. It's morning already right? I'll prepare to wake everyone up.
hourly.0600: It's 0600. All fleets, all hands on...wake up! It's morning, it's morning already!
hourly.0700: It's 0700, Commander. Umm...Breakfast is has been prepared...over here. It's your favorite, grounded natto and miso soup.
hourly.1000: It's 1000, Kumano-san's Commander. Kumano-san, are you looking for Suzauya-san? No, I haven't seen her today.
hourly.1100: It's 1100, Commander. Kumano-san was holding a lot of sandwiches. That was Suzuya-san's half right? A bit was split for us.
hourly.1200: Commander, it's 1200. The sandwiches Kumano-san brought were tasty. I ate it in one helping.
hourly.1900: It's 1900, Commander. I couldn't find enough ingredients for beef steak, so I prepared a whale steak instead. How is it?
hourly.2000: It's 2000, Commander. It's already night. Night battle?! No...Okinami is...
